data.text: Yeah. Sure.

translation.text: Vâng. Chắc chắn rồi.

data.text: -Okay, great.

translation.text: -Rất tốt.

data.text: Thank you.

translation.text: Cảm ơn bạn.

data.text: -You're welcome.

translation.text: -Không có gì.

data.text: -[ Gasps ] Mm.

translation.text: - [Gasps] Mm.

data.text: I love you. -I love you too.

translation.text: Tôi mến bạn. -Anh cũng yêu em.

data.text: -Mm!

translation.text: -Mm!

data.text: -Elizabeth Olsen, everybody.

translation.text: -Elizabeth Olsen, mọi người.

title: Elizabeth Olsen Doesn't Remember Acting in Mary-Kate and Ashley's Films
